body.name: Camera Tripod, 74" DSLR Camera Tripod with 2 QR Plates for Sony/Nikon/Canon, Lightweight Video Tripod Stand for Travelling, Phone Tripod with Fluid Head/Phone Holder/Wireless Remote Max.Load 6kg 175
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 39 mins
features: TRIPOD HEIGHT: This tripod is made of aluminum, with four feet flip locks, you can easily adjust the tripod’s height from 18.9 inches to 70 inches. If you use it for camera, your shooting height can be 74 inches. If you use it for phone, there is a 10cm rotatable phone holder for you. Also, it is very suit for you to carry. Because of the design of the detachable tripod head, the storage height is only 16 inches. It is a perfect lightweight professional camera tripod.

CONSIDERATE DESIGNS & USAGE: There are two level beads, one is on the head, the other one is on the body. So that you can check whether the ground or the device is stay in a horizontal mode. The tripod head is detachable, a good choose for carrying with. Before you install the head, you need to tighten the horizontal adjustment control knob. And there is a hook to hanging heaver objects if you have the need to reinforce the tripod especially when use outdoor. Perfect for photography and video.

COMPATIBLE PRODUCTS & PHONE MODES: There is a rotatable phone holder. You can fix the phone at any angle by tighten the knob. The holder can be stretched from 6cm to 10cm. For all phones including iPhone 14 Pro Max/14 Pro/14/13/12/XS/Samsung Galaxy/Xiaomi, etc. It equipped with a cold shoe which can be used for microphone or light. It also equipped with a 1/4” and a 3/8” screw. It is compatible with Sony/Canon/Nikon/Fujifilm cameras,DSLR, SLR, webcams, compact camcorders, digital cinema cameras.

RELIABLE PRODUCT QUALITY: This product is made of metal material and adopt the design of the rectangular tube which means it is very solid and makes the product more comfortable in the process of holding. There is a knob at the bottom of the tripod to lock the state of the feet so that the product more stable during use. The non-slip feet of the tripod are also detachable. In order to prevent parts from being lost, we present three extra feet to ensure your perfect use experience.

PACKAGE LIST & EXCELLENT SERVICE: In the package, you will get: 1 x camera tripod, 1 x wireless remote, 1 x phone holder, 1 x carry bag, 2 x quick release plate, 6 x anti-slip rubber feet. If you have any question, please contact Arsoer customer service freely. 24 months after-sales service are provided, we will try our best to guarantee your satisfied shopping experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vertical Mode Control Button If you wanna change the panel to be vertical, you should press the button to adjust. Spirit Level You can check whether the head is horizontal through seeing if the air bubble is in the middle of the level. Level Bubble You can check whether the tripod is on a smooth ground or the legs are on the balance. Hook You can hang some heavy objects to reinforence the tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is TALL
reviews.reviewText: So my old 20 year tripod failed on Christmas, so I bougt this. Tripod technology hasn't changed much since then, but there are two things that set this apart from other tripods. Frist off, the tripod can extend much taller than any of the other tripods I have seen. This is useful for shots that you want to be higher than and look downward. This also helps clear crowds at graduation and what not. The other great thing about this tripod is that it came with an attachment for a phone. This is great in itsself since most of the time the phone works as good as or better than a typical camera. This tripod is solid and overall would recommend to anyone looking to updgrade from an older tripod or need additional height.Forgot to mention that this tripod also came with extra rubber feet which is nice since they tend to fall off over the years. It also came with its own carrying case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price and stable
reviews.reviewText: Well made sturdy tripod. Use it to hold my Seestar smart telescope.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased for 9 year old son
reviews.reviewText: My son likes to record himself building legos. This tripod has been perfect. Super study. He carries it around and constantly adjusts it. Very easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best tripod stands in terms of stability
reviews.reviewText: The stand is light yet sturdy. It can go upto approx 4.5 - 4.8 feet and still be stable, and it is easy to adjust and operate the stand. I cam keep my Ipad and Iphone at any angle and orientation and it can take the weight easily. My friend tried to use the camera which is 1/2 kg and it still was pretty stable. make sure to not use it on a slopy surface though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Legs keep falling
reviews.reviewText: The legs on this tripod is horrible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camera Tripod Review
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the product. It was shipped quickly and arrived at my door in 2 days. It could be a bit sturdier but is good for what I need it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I was looking to purchase a tripod that would work with both my phone and Sony camera and when I found this one, it was great for my needs. The tripod has a nice smooth finish and looks really nice in my opinion. It comes with a nice carrying bag as well as a remote to control a phone that you connect to it to take pictures or videos, which is handy when you're in a park or a gathering. This is my first ever tripod that I bought, before I would use my phone or camera freely which would be a burden at times if I wanted to take pics with myself and the whole family. The tripod seems sturdy enough for me and my use cases, for example I took it with me to a picnic on the lake with my family and had it set up on sand and I did not feel like it would have a problem staying upright. In my opinion the price of the whole kit is great and inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and Reliable - used for any thing !
reviews.reviewText: It has exceeded all my expectations and proved to be an essential tool for my leveler, telescope, and camera needs. Its construction provides the stability required for my telescope. I used it for my leveler and its a game changer when hanging pictures. I also use it for my telescope and does it make a difference. I can literally put the telescope anywhere for the optimal view! Despite its sturdy construction, this tripod remains surprisingly portable. The collapsible design and lightweight materials make it convenient to carry along. It fits in my backpack, allowing me to take it anywhere. Kudos to the manufacturers for creating a product that can handle all my tripod needs. My mom even uses the phone attachment for those family photos
